metadata.title: CVE-2021-44420 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: In Django 2.2 before 2.2.25, 3.1 before 3.1.14, and 3.2 before 3.2.10, HTTP requests for URLs with trailing newlines could bypass upstream access control based on URL paths.

notes.note: mdeslaur> code in bionic is different, doesn't look affected

criterions.comment: python-django package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2:2.2.20-1ubuntu0.3').
